title: Adaptive Learning Design Tool Development and Evaluation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy, understanding of mathematics pedagogy, and LMS platform utilization experience
context.additional_context: Project-based course where pre-service teachers directly develop and evaluate adaptive learning tools for mathematics curriculum design. Personalized feedback is provided through individual learning data analysis in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three adaptive learning tools for math subjects using IMS Learning Design (LD) standards.
Learners can improve tool efficiency by over 80% by analyzing learner interaction data.
Learners can verify the usability and scalability of designed tools through peer evaluation.

resources: Learning Analytics Tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Learnosity)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
